C

canPlay - Variable in class MyFrame
Can the user play default = true
Card - Class in <Unnamed>
A standard UNO card, used when determining what to do when the card is played

Creates a card with passed in values
Card(String, String) - Constructor for class Card
creates a card with the passed in values and special effects
Card(int, int, int, int, Color, Card, Graphics2D) - Static method in class Paint
Paints a card at the specified position with the specified details
CardButtons - Variable in class MyFrame
Holds the JButtons that are used to select the cards
CardMatch(int) - Method in class Player
Determines weather the card in the active players hand match the top card in the main deck
Cards - Variable in class Deck
An ArrayList of cards
CardWildDecals(int, int, boolean, Graphics2D) - Static method in class Paint
Dynamically updates the wild card decals with the current four colors
ChangePlayers(String) - Static method in class FileManager
Changes the amount of players
ChangeSfx() - Method in class Settings
Turns off the sound effects in the game
Close - Static variable in class MyFrame
A JButton that closes the game Text = X

ColorValue - Variable in class Card
The color of the card Default = Red
CreateCardButtons() - Method in class MyFrame
Creates the buttons in the players hand and sets them invisable
CreateCards() - Static method in class Setup
Creates a ArrayList of cards and returns them
CreateDir(File) - Static method in class FileManager
Creates a directory
CreateFiles() - Static method in class FileManager
Creates all the files for the game Including the settings file, the player count file, and the how to play file
CreateLabel(int, int, int, int, String) - Static method in class Setup
